summary: The diff appears to implement the requested Help Center tile centering and hover tooltip, but it also introduces additional (unrequested) scroll-cue behavior/UX in HelpCenter and includes edits to non-required metadata/docs files. No clear missing requirements can be confirmed from the truncated diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Help Center nested scroll cue behavior/UX (scroll container ref + scroll cue hook) beyond the requested tile centering and hover title tooltip.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits changes to the specified tile centering and hover tooltip behavior and asks not to change application logic/behavior beyond those visual adjustments. The diff shows new hook usage and related state for scroll cues.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/HelpCenter.tsx (imports useRef/useScrollCues; scrollContainerRef and canScrollUp/canScrollDown/hasScrolled usage shown)

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest, which constrained the change to frontend Help Center tile styling/tooltip behavior.
Not requested; changes are outside the minimum necessary implementation in HelpCenter tiles.
